item.title: Need Help With Message Board!
item.dc:creator: @ShaunH98 ShaunH98
item.description:
@ShaunH98 wrote:

Hi!

i have a crazy pk place and i wanna set some rules at the bottem it says Type :cpkrules and when it loads up the message it has no text there this is the code

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("cpkrules") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sq("@whi@The rules for crazy pk", 10121); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sq("",10122 ); sq("@blk@ No looting!", 10123); sq("@gre@ Mods and admins no using P-Ring", 10124); sq("@blu@ If you loot you will recive a warning", 10124); sqSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream();[code/]
